name: Memory of You
description: Increases the number of times the Talent's Counter effect can be triggered each turn by 1. When Counter is triggered, deals additional Ice DMG equal to <unbreak>60%</unbreak> of March 7th's DEF.

name: Memory of It
description: Every time March 7th's Ultimate Freezes a target, she regenerates <unbreak>20</unbreak> Energy.

name: Memory of Everything
description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

name: Don't Want to Lose
description: Upon entering battle, grants a Shield equal to <unbreak>100%</unbreak> of March 7th's DEF plus <unbreak>400</unbreak> to the ally with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for <unbreak>6</unbreak> turn(s).

name: Don't Want to Forget
description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

name: Just Like This, Always...
description: Allies under the protection of the Shield granted by the Skill restores HP equal to <unbreak>12%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>96</unbreak> at the beginning of each turn.
